module.exports.config = {
	name: "ad",
  version: "1.0.1",
	hasPermssion: 0,
	credits: "ThanhAli", 
	description: "á»œ thÃ¬ khÃ´ng dáº¥u lá»‡nh",
	commandCategory: "ð“ð¢ðžð§ ð¢ðœð¡",
	usages: "",
    cooldowns: 5, 
};
const fs = require('fs');
const request = require('request');
const axios = require('axios');
module.exports.handleEvent = function({ api, event, client, __GLOBAL }) {
	var { threadID, messageID } = event;
	if (event.body.indexOf("viethung")==0 || (event.body.indexOf("ad")==0)) {
     axios.get('https://api.hungnguyen229.repl.co/gai').then(res => { 
    let ext = res.data.data.substring(res.data.data.lastIndexOf(".") + 1);

const time = process.uptime(),
		hours = Math.floor(time / (60 * 60)),
		minutes = Math.floor((time % (60 * 60)) / 60),
		seconds = Math.floor(time % 60);
  var z_1 = (hours < 10) ? '0' + hours : hours;
    var x_1 = (minutes < 10) ? '0' + minutes : minutes;
    var y_1 = (seconds < 10) ? '0' + seconds : seconds;
	global.nodemodule["pidusage"](process.pid);
	const timeStart = Date.now();
          let callback = function () {
       api.sendMessage({body: `â–· ðˆðð…ðŽ ð€ðƒðŒðˆð ðƒðŽð‘ð„ðŒðŽðððŽð“ ð•ðˆð â—\nâž¢ ð€ðð¦ð¢ð§ ððšð¦ðž : ðð ð®ð²ðžð§ ð•ð¢ðžð­ ð‡ð®ð§ð \nâž¢ ðð¢ðžð­ ðƒðšð§ð¡ : ð¯ð¡ð¬ðŸ\nâž¢ ð“ð®ð¨ð¢ : ðŸðŸ—ð“ / ðŸðŠðšð«ðŸ‘\nâž¢ ð“ð¢ð§ð¡ ð‚ðšðœð¡ : ðƒðžÌ‚Ìƒ ð†ðšÌ‚Ì€ð§\nâž¢ ð‚ð¡ð¢ðžð® ð‚ðšð¨ : ðŸð¦ðŸ•ðŸ”\nâž¢ ð‹ð¢ð§ð¤ ð…ðšðœðžð›ð¨ð¨ð¤ : m.me/100007471728428 ${hours} ${minutes} ${seconds}`, attachment: fs.createReadStream(__dirname + `/cache/gaixinh.${ext}`)
  }, threadID, () => fs.unlinkSync(__dirname + `/cache/gaixinh.${ext}`), messageID);
  }
request(res.data.data).pipe(fs.createWriteStream(__dirname + `/cache/gaixinh.${ext}`)).on("close", callback);
			})}
    }
	module.exports.run = function({ api, event, client, __GLOBAL }) {

}
